main event: An unidentified aerial phenomenon was observed in Belmont, Ohio, on 3 NOV 1965.
interesting points: The object was observed briefly for about 30 seconds at night,The sky was bright with clouds clearing during the sighting,The object was reported to be much brighter than the moon or stars,It was described as having several smaller bright lights on its edges,The observer noted that the object disappeared quickly after being called.
